Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Now that Greg Schiano is the coach of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, perhaps the thorniest issue is whether Rutgers will continue to emphasize the football program.
snippet: Now that Greg Schiano is the coach of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, perhaps the thorniest issue is whether Rutgers will continue to emphasize the football program.
